message.content:
cs.CR, cs.CY, cs.DC, cs.SE, cs.GT

This paper discusses the security of the Bitcoin payment protocol, which falls under the category of computer security (cs.CR). The paper also proposes a new approach for protection against refund attacks using the Bitcoin multi-signature mechanism, which involves cryptography (cs.CY) and distributed computing (cs.DC). The paper also discusses the security of the proposed method, which involves software engineering (cs.SE) and graph theory (cs.GT).
